sect1.title: Acknowledgements
sect1.para: The editors of the book would like to acknowledge people who have assisted in making the book, what it is today.

listitem.para: Nathan Coulson - Bootscripts, typo, and content fixes.
Richard Downing - Testing, typo, and content fixes.
Peter Ennis - Typo and content fixes.
Tony Morgan - Typo and content fixes.
Ryan Oliver - Developer of the Cross-LFS scripts.

sect1.para: Thank you all for your support.
